snippet: Standing in the way of a ninth Monte Carlo Masters title for Rafael Nadal is Frenchman Gael Monfils, an opponent the Spaniard has beaten every time they've met on clay and who has a dismal 5-18 record in finals....
lead_paragraph: Standing in the way of a ninth Monte Carlo Masters title for Rafael Nadal is Frenchman Gael Monfils, an opponent the Spaniard has beaten every time they've met on clay and who has a dismal 5-18 record in finals.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Chases 9th Monte Carlo Title, Faces Monfils in Final
headline.main: Nadal Chases 9th Monte Carlo Title, Faces Monfils in Final
